com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web

Class SCUISafeRequestWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web.SCUISafeRequestWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest

    public class SCUISafeRequestWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
    This wrapper wraps HttpServletRequest object in order to validate all request inputs. Each request input is validated against registered/default rules.

    Note: If a context parameter is set to suppress all validation exceptions, and an invalid input is encountered, empty string will be returned. asmishra

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest
